page.title: 09GLASSHOUSES MILL - PRESENT
page.content: Glasshouses Mill is now used as a site for several small businesses, namely: Nidderdale Furnishings makes curtains, cushion covers and bedspreads for chain stores; Tushingham Sails makes sailing equipment such as life jackets,sails and surfboards; Wild Water makes yachting equipment and canoes; there are car repair and welding businesses run by Mr Dodsworth and Mr Wilson respectively and a Mill Shop and Cafe. Also, the Royal National Lifeboat Institution has its NE Regional HQ here as it is equidistant from the east and west coasts. From here all the goods that the RNLI sell in markets and stalls all over the country are prepared for distribution.
